title: Blockbuster 2025: Wall Street’s Best Run Since 2009 - Can the Magic Repeat in 2026?
description: Global markets kicked off 2026 positively, continuing the rally from the previous year, driven by optimism surrounding artificial intelligence, easing inflation, and supportive central banks. , Economy, Times Now
content:
The opening session of January mirrored the momentum of late 2025, reinforcing a simple message for investors: taking risk paid off.
Global markets began 2026 on a strong note, extending a powerful rally that defined much of last year. Investor optim... [3663 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Revolutionary AI Initiative Accelerates TB Screening in Thane
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
